radar_system_requirements.txt: The radar system must detect missiles within a 500 km range.
The system should track up to 50 targets simultaneously.
The radar should provide real-time updates with a refresh rate of 1 second.
The system must classify targets based on speed and trajectory.
The radar must integrate with the missile defense system for automated responses.
Provide code coverage of at least 90% for all radar system components.
Perform extensive testing including unit tests, integration tests, and system tests.
Implement requirements tracing from specifications to test cases.
touch_screen_interface_requirements.txt: The touch screen must have a resolution of at least 1920x1080.
The interface should support multi-touch gestures.
Provide real-time feedback with a latency of less than 50ms.
Ensure the interface is intuitive and user-friendly.
Implement a robust calibration process to maintain accuracy.
Provide code coverage of at least 90% for all interface components.
Perform extensive testing including unit tests, integration tests, and usability tests.
Implement requirements tracing from specifications to test cases.
